attributes.action: An MP that changes party should stand down and submit to a by-election.
attributes.additional_details: The current Brexit crises has shown how disloyal some MPs have become and with a new party (Change UK) in town it has become easier to switch parties than it is to switch your energy supply. This should not be the norm.
attributes.background: With so many MPs changing allegiance it has has become obvious that these MPs no longer represent the view of their constituents. Having an MP unfairly representing them in Parliament is an injustice and should be rectified immediately with a by-election.
